hadiths.text: Sad said:"We returned during the Hajj with the Prophet and some of us said that they had stoned (the Jamarat) with seven stones, and other said that they had done so with six, and no one denounced anyone else

chapter.ara-name: باب عَدَدِ الْحَصَى الَّتِي يُرْمَى بِهَا الْجِمَارُ
chapter.eng-name: The Number of Pebbles To bE Thrown At the Jimar.
